alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 7:58PM CDT until April 02 at 5:49AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, County Road 372 will begin flooding near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 5.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 10.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Black River Annapolis 8.0 5.7 Wed 7 pm 8.4 6.8 5.8 5.1 4.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
